system.sustained: Psyker targets mechanical or electronic automated weapon with mass no more than 50kg*Psy Rating. If successful, psyker seizes control of weapon for as long as they sustain the power. If a machine spirit occupies this weapon, such as to automatically target enemies, it is killed. As a result, when no longer controlled the device will fall silent and be unable to perform any functions the machine spirit would have performed until a new machine spirit is coaxed into replacing it by a Tech-Priest or other suitable individual.
